title: Blueberry Futures Check website
description: Blueberry Futures, established November 2025, offers a single-step funded trading program listed as
forbidden_strategies: DCA limit: Max 3 entries per trade idea (1 initial + 2 adds).
Hedging: Long + Short on same asset (including cross-contract) prohibited.
One-Direction Rule: Max leverage on single trade idea without justification prohibited.
VPN/VPS usage to bypass restrictions = termination.

payout_policy.processing_time: No waiting period once conditions met.
payout_policy.details: 5 profitable trading days ($200+ each). Same payout logic for Ascent/Accelerated. Required buffer: $1100-$4600. Minimum payout + buffer required.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Yes, to third-party platforms for copying own trades only.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Manual scalping allowed. HFT/tick scalping prohibited.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: No inactivity period. 30-day subscription for evaluation.
firm_rules.news_trading: Restricted 3 mins before/after Red Folder (High Impact) news. Existing positions can be managed.
forbidden_strategies: DCA limit: Max 3 entries per trade idea (1 initial + 2 adds).
Hedging: Long + Short on same asset (including cross-contract) prohibited.
One-Direction Rule: Max leverage on single trade idea without justification prohibited.
VPN/VPS usage to bypass restrictions = termination.
